attributes.action: Remove MP Maria Miller from Parliament
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned request the immediate removal of MP Maria Miller from public office.
Having been found guilty of abusing her position of trust by misusing public funds for her own gain, we wish that MP Miller be treated like any other person who had been found to be incompetent or fraudulent in the work place and as such be removed from Parliament with immediate effect.

rejection.details: This is a Party political matter and not for Government
